Overwrite settings for analysis in Map Viewer.

Specifies the type of output that will be created. The Create intermediate data option creates a temporary layer that can be used as input to another tool but cannot be saved or viewed on the map. The Create hosted layer option publishes a new hosted feature layer. The Overwrite existing layer option updates an existing layer with the tool output.

The name of the layer that will be created and added to the map.

Specifies whether the output of the tool will overwrite a layer in your content that has the specified output name. If that layer name is not yet used in your organization, a new item will be created. You must be either the owner of the layer or an administrator to overwrite it.

The name of the folder in My content where the results will be saved.

This cannot be updated if the layer already exists.

The layer in My content that will be overwritten by the output layer. The spatial references of the output and the existing layer must match.
